summary: Seven misfits are trapped by a flesh eating slime creature. And no TV!
cast: Vinnie Bilancio|Victoria De Mare|Ronnie Lewis|Kelli Kaye|Gia Paloma|Magic J. Ellingson|Micol Bartolucci|Al Burke|Monique La Barr|Tai Chan Ngo|Ron Fitzgerald|Thomas Bosack|Robert G. Beck|Dave Corsile|Roxy DeVille|Mark Stefanovski|Exavier Wray
title: Contagion
